review: The fire stick is an easy little device, that has a great price point.  Buy it with the sling tv deal, and it pretty much is free! however, I already have a roku and got this for an additional tv.  The set up and everything is very easy to use - however i have to say i still prefer the roku.  i already noticed some of the apps are not available on the fire stick ( such as fox), which limits what you are getting right off the bat.  the navigation is decent on this thing, but roku's is still better.

review: I've had it for a week and have enjoyed speeding to the shows I like. I have used the phone app too, it's a gem. To be able to just say a show name and it pops up on the screen, very cool! I would like to be able to edit my photos with the Firestick. Specifically delete what I don't want in my cloud. The stick also froze on my last night and refused to respond. Probably a one time issue. I'm excited to have this cool little piece of technology.
